author: rdonkin
msg: Switch from direct use of project.version to new variable. Projects inheriting from this pom will now be able to vary the james server version and their version independently. Thus allowing simplification and reduction of duplication in child poms.

author: thorsten
msg: Declaring StAX components in spring context to be usable from the sitemap.

msg: CAMEL-4351 Fixed the issue of placeholders in endpointName and serviceName attributes of cxf:cxfEndpoint
